items.title: Newsom Says Benioff Is Still ‘Family’ Despite the National Guard Remarks
items.summary: Gov. Gavin Newsom has a long relationship with Marc Benioff, the chief executive of Salesforce, that dates back to a different era in San Francisco.

items.title: Pelosi Says Police May Arrest Federal Agents Who Violate California Law
items.summary: The San Francisco district attorney said in an interview that she came up with the strategy after seeing federal agents repeatedly roughing up people in Los Angeles and Chicago.

items.title: What to Know About the White House East Wing and Its History
items.summary: The East Wing has been a base for the first lady, an entryway for social functions and an emergency bunker.

items.title: Trump Imposes Sanctions on Russian Oil Companies as His Frustration With Putin Mounts
items.summary: The sanctions are among the most significant measures that the United States has taken against the Russian energy sector since the beginning of the war in Ukraine.

items.title: Senator Merkley Warns of Authoritarianism Under Trump in Nearly 23-Hour Speech
items.summary: The Oregon Democrat achieved a goal of topping the previous longest speech by a senator from his state.

items.title: The White House Wrecking Ball
items.summary: President Trump’s demolition of the East Wing has struck a nerve in Washington and beyond.

items.title: Cuomo condemned over racist AI ad depicting ‘criminals for Zohran Mamdani’
items.summary: <p>Official X accounts posts and then deletes AI-generated attack ad that prompts widespread denunciation</p><ul><li><p><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/oct/22/key-takeaways-new-york-final-mayoral-debate">Personal attacks rather than policy: key takeaways from New York’s final mayoral debate</a></p></li></ul><p>New York City mayoral hopeful Andrew Cuomo has been widely labeled as racist after his official X account posted – and then deleted – an AI-generated ad depicting “criminals for Zohran Mamdani”.</p><p>Not even 20 minutes into the second mayoral debate, Cuomo’s official account, @andrewcuomo, tweeted the video. It was reshared by many before being deleted.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/oct/23/cuomo-zohran-mamdani-ai-ad">Continue reading...</a>

items.title: Personal attacks rather than policy: key takeaways from New York’s final mayoral debate
items.summary: <p>Candidates jockeyed for advantage during debate, but were unlikely to change voters’ minds before election day</p><p><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/zohran-mamdani">Zohran Mamdani</a>, the Democratic nominee and current frontrunner for New York City mayor, faced off with <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/andrew-cuomo">Andrew Cuomo</a>, the former New York governor now running as an independent, and Curtis Sliwa, the <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/republicans">Republican</a> candidate, at the second and final New York mayoral election debate on Wednesday night.</p><p>Here are some key takeaways from the evening.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/oct/22/key-takeaways-new-york-final-mayoral-debate">Continue reading...</a>
